This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0659 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
1 OR Mode Without OperatorOR Mode Without Operator
2 OR Mode with OperatorOR Mode with Operator
3 CPD Mode Without OperatorCPD Mode Without Operator
4 CPD Mode With OperatorCPD Mode With Operator
5 Offline ModeOffline Mode

name: LotControl
title: lotControl
description: Code system of concepts that define whether the sterilization load for a device is built in the sub-sterile area adjacent to an Operating Room or the Central Processing Department. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the SCP segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0659 (Lot Control)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated
